<<<api>>>: StringTokenizer.nextToken
<<<code>>>: 
```java
String textarea = "<textarea>This is line 1.\nThis is line 2.\nThis is line 3.</textarea>";
String lines[] = textarea.split("\n");
```
<<<explanation>>>: The given code uses the `split()` method to split the textarea content into an array of lines. The `split()` method takes a regular expression as an argument, and in this case, we use `"\n"` to split the content at each newline character. The resulting array `lines` will contain each line of the textarea content as separate elements.
